name: bun-file-server
description: A simple and fast file server powered by Bun

scripts.build:executables: bun build ./index.ts --compile --minify --sourcemap --bytecode --outfile dist/bun-file-server-linux-x64 --target bun-linux-x64 && bun build ./index.ts --compile --minify --sourcemap --bytecode --outfile dist/bun-file-server-linux-arm64 --target bun-linux-arm64 && bun build ./index.ts --compile --minify --sourcemap --bytecode --outfile dist/bun-file-server-windows-x64.exe --target bun-windows-x64 && bun build ./index.ts --compile --minify --sourcemap --bytecode --outfile dist/bun-file-server-darwin-arm64 --target bun-darwin-arm64 && bun build ./index.ts --compile --minify --sourcemap --bytecode --outfile dist/bun-file-server-darwin-x64 --target bun-darwin-x64

author: Lawson Oates
